business_definition: Group item containing work areas for abend (abnormal end) routine processing
Four-character code identifying the type of abend or error condition (VALUE SPACES)
Eight-character field identifying the program or module that caused the abend (VALUE SPACES)
Fifty-character description explaining the reason for the abend or error condition (VALUE SPACES)
Seventy-two character message field containing detailed abend information for logging or display (VALUE SPACES)
